source.name: Automated Time Clock for Time & Attendance
source.description: Without any automated time clock systems, organizations have to manage their employee’s payroll data manually from the point of data entry to storage and data processing stages. Learn more http://uattend.blog.com/2012/11/23/uattend-time-attendance-systems-for-streamlined-payroll-management/
